name: Urban Legends
description:
First Person puzzle game where player has a gravity gun to help solve puzzles.

Creators- Terry Hess, Claude White, Corey Heator, Christian Batten

Move- w,s,a,d or arrow keys

Look- mouse

Jump- space bar

Crouch- c

Action- e

Gravity Gun Pick Up Object- right mouse

Gravity Gun Throw Object- left mouse
